title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat! This incredible mat is perfect for all your fitness needs, whether it's yoga, Pilates, or floor exercises. 

Measuring 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, this mat provides plenty of space for you to stretch and move comfortably. And with a thickness of 2/5 inch, it offers extra cushioning and support for your joints and muscles. 

The Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat is made of high-quality NBR foam, ensuring durability and long-lasting use. It weighs just 3.11 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to carry around. 

The mat comes in a beautiful teal color, adding a touch of style to your workout routine. It also includes a convenient carrier strap, so you can easily take it with you wherever you go. 

With its soft cushioning and extra thickness, this mat is designed to provide maximum comfort and support during your workouts. It's perfect for elderly folks who may need a little extra cushioning for their joints. 

Stay active, stay fit, and stay comfortable with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat. Get yours today and start enjoying a more enjoyable and effective workout experience!
